Record.ClassificationPath: Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Physiological Effects of Drugs/Reproductive Control Agents/Contraceptive Agents/Contraceptive Agents, Female/Contraceptives, Oral
Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Therapeutic Uses/Reproductive Control Agents/Contraceptive Agents/Contraceptive Agents, Female/Contraceptives, Oral
Record.Description: Compounds, usually hormonal, taken orally in order to block ovulation and prevent the occurrence of pregnancy. The hormones are generally estrogen or progesterone or both.
